column4: I have a hard disk that is corrupt (showing as a 300MB CD Drive in windows lol), is there a tutorial guide out there on repairing it in 11.10 (the data isnt important aslong as I can  get it working again).
why would you want to keep a disk that has gone corrupt?  chances are it's goign to happen again
didn't realise it made the probability higher, would like to get it working again though if I could to tide me over until I got a new one
i would think if you didn't do anything software wise to corrupt it, it's probably hardware related and is going to happen again
